feed.title: Category: Logging | Words, In Some Order

entry.title: Lumberjack.jl: Lets Talk About Logging in Models
entry.content: Evan Miller made an interesting observation in his blog recently: “[Julia is] poised to do for technical computing what Node.js is doing for web development — getting disparate groups of programmers to code in the same language.” Well, I agree, and I might take it further. I’d like to see scientists and modelers come together with server-side developers to talk about logging… (contiue reading)
